name: Pumpkin and Shrimp Soup
author: Niki
summary: This unusual combination of pumpkin and shrimp is a surprise. Curry powder and chicken broth add flavor and aroma to an already fantastic fall soup. Serve it in a hollowed out pumpkin for company or for fun.
ingredients: ⅓ pound small shrimp - peeled and deveined
directions: Clean out the cooking pumpkin; remove the skin and cut into 1/2inch dice
In a saucepan, simmer the pumpkin, celery salt, curry powder, milk, and broth for about 30 minutes
Stir to keep the milk from burning
If you are going to serve the soup in a pumpkin, boil 2 quarts of water
Cut the top off of the pumpkin and clean out carefully
Cut a notch in the top for the ladle to stick through
Pour the boiling water into the pumpkin and swish around and then pour into sink
Pour the soup into the pumpkin and serve with lemon wedges
Add half the shrimp to the pumpkin mixture and process in a food processor or blender until smooth
Add the remaining whole shrimp and simmer for 5 more minutes
